item.title: Fourth Week ‚Äî Midst of the First Exam Session
item.description:
üìå Week of June 16 to June 22

The exam session was in full swing. We took the economics exam ‚Äî the questions were quite challenging, but preparation paid off. The programming exam went better than I expected: the tasks on loops and arrays were quite manageable.

I realized that during exams, having a clear answer plan and the ability to quickly highlight the key points helps the most.

After classes, we would go out on campus with friends ‚Äî just to get some fresh air and discuss how the exams went.
